channel.title: Posts on SeeHisFace
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SeeHisFace

item.title: First post!
item.description: Hello I intend to use this site to help with my biblical studies, allowing me to record my exploration of subjects that I am interested in. In presenting that information to other, I will hopefully develop a deeper understanding of the subjects I discuss here. I am also hoping this will also allow me to develop my writing skills, which are lacking. Anyway welcome to the site, next update will be soon.
